properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Siku ile niliyokuita,
uliniitikia,
ukanifariji nafsi yangu
nakunitia nguvu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nitakushukuru Bwana
wangu kwa,
moyo wangu wote
mbele yao miungu
nitakuimbia zaburi.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nitakushukuru nikilikabili
hekalu lako,nitalishukuru
jina lako jina lako takatifu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana wafalme wa dunia
watakushukuru
watakapoyasikia maneno
ya kinywa chako.
